thread.title: nikki gill

author: nikki gill
title: nikki gill
text: I can't rate tails highly enough.. the food is excellent quality, I love that you can tailor each dogs food to their requirements. It's very useful to have the dogs name on their bag and the scoop is great, there's little I hate more than having had to weigh out each portion with the previous food I used. Having the food delivered is a great plus too. The emails keeping you up to date with deliveries etc is really useful too.
